Subsection.Text: Within 20 days after the determination of damages by the arbitration panel pursuant to s. 766.207, the defendant shall:

Paragraph.Text: Pay the arbitration award, including interest at the legal rate, to the claimant; or
Submit any dispute among multiple defendants to arbitration pursuant to s. 766.208.

Subsection.Text: Commencing 90 days after the award rendered in the arbitration procedure pursuant to s. 766.207, such award shall begin to accrue interest at the rate of 18 percent per year.
